<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>1)Has access group  - only one market mapped =  cca48e8a1bf675906ed00e1ad34bcb01 (Sougata)
2) Has associated market of the trade , but no access group based group = 61b83c6c1b210e58ff37eb14b24bcba6 ( Kanishka )
3) Does not have associated market of the trade = 86c4b4641b70f1106ed00e1ad34bcbb8 ( Bharat)
4) Has access group - two markets mapped = 0c33c9421b1465106ed00e1ad34bcb57 (Robin Sharma)</description>
        <name>Band Limit Check - 3173</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[//Band Limit Testing Code

var userID = 'cca48e8a1bf675906ed00e1ad34bcb01';
var trdID = '78a8633b1b960a946ed00e1ad34bcb06';

var grTrade = new GlideRecord('x_hsb11_mss_c_proc_mss_custody_trade');
grTrade.get(trdID);
var owningBusiness = grTrade.owning_business;
gs.info('owningBusiness of Trade ' + grTrade.owning_business);
gs.info('Settlement amount in  USD Limit ' + grTrade.settlement_amount_in_usd);
gs.info('Trade Nominal Amount in USD ' + grTrade.nominal_settlement_amount_in_usd);
//newLines
var trdType = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group_type');
trdType.get(owningBusiness);
var typeID = trdType.sys_id;
//newLines
gs.info('owningBusiness of Trade ' + typeID);
var grUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
grUser.get(userID);
gs.info('Selected User ' + grUser.first_name);
var userMarket = grUser.u_associated_business_markets;
gs.info('userMarket ' + userMarket.toString());

if (userMarket.indexOf(owningBusiness) > -1) {
    gs.info('within Loop');
    var grGroup = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember");
    grGroup.addEncodedQuery('group.u_group_location=Onshore^group.typeLIKEb779129d1b844650ff37eb14b24bcb47');
    grGroup.addQuery('user.sys_id', userID);
    grGroup.addQuery('group.u_associated_group_band', grUser.u_user_band);
    grGroup.addQuery('group.type', typeID); //to match trade market vs user market
    //grGroup.orderByDesc('group.u_usd_limit');
    grGroup.query();
    if (grGroup.next()) {
        gs.info('Group selected ' + grGroup.group.getDisplayValue());
        gs.info('Limit Compared  ' + grGroup.group.u_usd_limit);

        if ((grTrade.settlement_amount_in_usd <= grGroup.group.u_usd_limit) && (grTrade.nominal_settlement_amount_in_usd <= grGroup.group.u_usd_limit)) {
            gs.info('Within Approval level'); //true
        } else
            gs.info('Higher limit than user Level'); //false
    } else
        gs.info('User Does not belong to any groups allowed for trade approval'); //false

} else
    gs.info('User Does not belong to Trade market'); //false]]></script>
